Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the sale of cannabinoid hemp products
Summary: Prohibits the sale of cannabinoid hemp products where the ratio of CBD to THC exceeds a 15:1 ratio.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, in relation to the requirements for the ratio of cannabidiol to THC for cannabinoid hemp products
